title: 1Password - 4.1 [Intel/K]
description:
Have you ever forgotten a password? 1Password can remember them all for you and keep them secure.

All you need to remember is your Master Password.

Loved and used by millions. Try 1Password today!

STAY SECURE WITH 1PASSWORD

Every day there are new passwords to remember. If you create new ones they are often forgotten. If you use the same passwords over and over again you become vulnerable. 1Password solves all these problems.

Ã¢â€”â€  Create strong, unique passwords for every site
Ã¢â€”â€  Secure your data behind a single Master Password
Ã¢â€”â€  Protect yourself with tamper-proof Authenticated 256-bit AES Encryption
Ã¢â€”â€  Auto-Lock keeps your data protected even if your Mac is lost or stolen
Ã¢â€”â€  Use Security Audit to make your passwords stronger

BE MORE PRODUCTIVE WITH 1PASSWORD

1Password not only keeps you secure with strong and unique passwords, it also makes you more productive.

Ã¢â€”â€  Automatically log into websites using your favorite browsers
Ã¢â€”â€  Fill credit cards and signup forms with a single click
Ã¢â€”â€  Quickly access your data from anywhere using 1Password mini
Ã¢â€”â€  Open websites and automatically submit login information using Go & Fill bookmarks
Ã¢â€”â€  Never again waste time on forgotten passwords

PROTECT MORE THAN JUST PASSWORDS

1Password allows you to store a lot more than just website logins. Keep all your important information available at your fingertips.

Ã¢â€”â€  Store Credit Cards, Secure Notes, Passports, Bank Accounts, and much more
Ã¢â€”â€  Easily remember website Security Questions and generate secure answers
Ã¢â€”â€  Securely store documents and images
Ã¢â€”â€  Never leave home without your important information again

EVERY DEVICE HAS EVERY LOGIN

1Password supports all your favorite devices. Keep your critical information with you wherever you go.

Ã¢â€”â€  iCloud support means secure syncing with Apple simplicity
Ã¢â€”â€  Dropbox support provides cross-platform syncing and sharing
Ã¢â€”â€  Use custom folder sync to sync computers within the security of your own network

SECURELY SHARE WITH FAMILY OR TEAM MEMBERS

1Password allows you to organize your data into multiple vaults and securely share them with others. Use separate vaults to choose what you share and who you share it with.

Ã¢â€”â€  Share business logins with your co-workers
Ã¢â€”â€  Create a family vault to share with your spouse
Ã¢â€”â€  Distribute encryption keys with your development team
Ã¢â€”â€  Exchange accounts and documents with your clients
Ã¢â€”â€  Relieve the burden of estate planning for your loved ones

The possibilities are endless! Best of all you can securely sync your vaults so everyone always has the latest information.

AND MUCH MUCH MORE

Ã¢â€”â€  Full support for OS X Mountain Lion and ready for surfing the future
Ã¢â€”â€  Mark your most used items as Favorites
Ã¢â€”â€  Organize your data with Folders and Tags
Ã¢â€”â€  Save powerful searches as Smart Folders
Ã¢â€”â€  No subscription or other fees
Ã¢â€”â€  Available in more than 10 languages
Ã¢â€”â€  Free support from a world-class Customer Support team

LOVED AND USED BY MILLIONS

1Password has won many awards, including:

Ã¢â€”â€  Mac|Life EditorÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Choice with a rating of Ã¢â‚¬Å“Awesome!Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ 
Ã¢â€”â€  App Store Editors' Choice Award
Ã¢â€”â€  Macworld Eddy Award Winner 
Ã¢â€”â€  Mac App StoreÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Best Apps of 2011
Ã¢â€”â€  The Mac Observer 2013 Editors Choice Award
Ã¢â€”â€  MacworldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Ã¢â‚¬Å“20 Best AppsÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ of 2012 and listed in their App Hall of Fame

While we love these awards, weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re most proud of the fact that millions of people love and use 1Password.

WEÃ¢â‚¬â„¢D LOVE TO HEAR FROM YOU

We love 1Password and strive to make it the best it can be. WeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢d love to hear from you and see how we can make it even better. 

Please share your comments by emailing us directly at <a class="__cf_email__" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" data-cfemail="0b787e7b7b64797f4b6a6c62676e69627f782568646625">[email&#160;protected]</a><script cf-hash='f9e31' type="text/javascript">

We look forward to hearing from you :)

Whats New in Version 4.0.8
This update includes several important improvements and fixes.

Improved 
* Added option to add or update Software Licenses by dragging and dropping apps to 1Password dock icon.
* Improved syncing performance.
* It is now possible to import .1pif files by double-clicking on them in the Finder.
* If the database file is damaged and cannot be opened, 1Password mini will now prompt to restore the most latest backup.
* Updated translations.

Fixed
* Fixed problem where Rich Icons would not download.
* Fixed problem where it was not possible move items to folders.
* Fixed problem where sync with invalid .agilekeychain might create emtpy items.
* Fixed problem where 1Password mini could crash on certain database files.
* Fixed problem that prevented import of new vaults by double-clicking an existing .agilekeychain in Finder.
* Fixed crash in 1Password mini that could happen after changing preferred language in System Preferences.
* Fixed the problem where in some cases the database could not be open immediately after the backup copy was made.
* 1Password Sync Preferences now show correct status information when locked.
* Fixed problem where phone number might not sync correctly to 1Password 3.
* Fixed problems in Chinese translation.
* Fixed crash in syncing.

What's New in Version 4.1
We have some great new features and fixes in this update based on your feedback. Please continue sharing it with us at <a class="__cf_email__" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" data-cfemail="1f6c6a6f6f706d6b5f7e7876737a7d766b6c317c707231">[email&#160;protected]</a><script cf-hash='f9e31' type="text/javascript">
/* <![CDATA[ */!function(){try{var t="currentScript"in document?document.currentScript:function(){for(var t=document.getElementsByTagName("script"),e=t.length;e--;)if(t[e].getAttribute("cf-hash"))return t[e]}();if(t&&t.previousSibling){var e,r,n,i,c=t.previousSibling,a=c.getAttribute("data-cfemail");if(a){for(e="",r=parseInt(a.substr(0,2),16),n=2;a.length-n;n+=2)i=parseInt(a.substr(n,2),16)^r,e+=String.fromCharCode(i);e=document.createTextNode(e),c.parentNode.replaceChild(e,c)}}}catch(u){}}();/* ]]> */</script> We love hearing from you!

New and Improved in 4.1:
Top Item List Layout
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Display your items as a multi-column display (View->Item List Layout->Top).
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Sort, order and resize columns to match your needs.

Search All Fields
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Select search by Title or search across All Fields.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Expand an existing search result to include All Fields if your item is not found.

Print
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Ability to print an individual item through the Share menu.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Print your entire list of items through File->Print...

Auto-save
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ You can now Tag and assign a Folder when saving a Login from the browser.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ When changing a password you can select whether to save a new Login or update the existing one.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Redundant generated passwords are now removed after saving or updating a Login.

Custom Password Fields
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Add custom password fields to your items (for example, website security questions).
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Convert existing text fields into concealed password fields.

Adding Support for...
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Yandex Browser.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Dutch and Afrikaans localization.

Syncing
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fixed a problem where, in some cases, 1Password would not automatically detect and sync changes in secondary vaults.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fixed problem where WiFi sync would not work when syncing large number of items from the iOS device.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fixed problem where sync won't start automatically after items are imported.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fixed problem where WiFi sync might duplicate item URLs when a conflict is detected.

Security
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 1Password will now auto-lock on inactivity timeout when computer wakes up from sleep.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ All values copied to clipboard are now marked with org.nspasteboard.ConcealedType (http://nspasteboard.org).
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Attachment cache is now cleared when 1Password app is closed.
